about_the_game:
About This Game:

CONE CRUSHERS: Autocross is a practical and immersive sandbox racing game designed for autocross enthusiasts and casual drivers alike. Whether you're looking to hone your skills on tight, cone-filled tracks or take a break for a bit of joyriding, Cone Crushers offers a mix of precision racing and free roam exploration.

In addition to mastering challenging procedural autocross courses, you can take your finely-tuned vehicle for a spin through a small open world surrounding the event area, offering a small playground for free driving. Whether you're perfecting your lap times or simply enjoying the thrill of driving, Cone Crushers delivers a dynamic experience for everyone. As you progress you will unlock new locations and garages at which you can fill with your favorite vehicles, and appropriately outfit with tools, toolboxes and furniture. 

Key Features:

  • Authentic Autocross Simulation: Experience the precision of autocross with realistic physics and ever-changing course layouts. Navigate through tight obstacles like lane changes and Chicago boxes to test your driving skills.

  • Procedural Course Generation: Infinite course layouts to keep every race fresh and challenging. No two tracks are ever the same.

  • Vehicle Customization & Tuning: Personalize and optimize your vehicle’s performance with a range of customization options, including wheels, tires, body paint, and tuning setups. Adjust spring length, strength and dampening, transmission timings and more. 

  • Unlock and Customize Garages: Outside the cone-filled tracks, as you progress, you will unlock new locations, amongst which will be new garages for you to store your vehicles and fill with cosmetics, such as tool boxes, lifts, floor jacks, etc. 

  • Course Design: Spawn cones to design and build your own autocross courses using the cone spawning tool. Assemble different layouts with custom obstacles to form your very own course to race on. 

  • CONE CRUSHERS: Autocross combines the skill-based precision of autocross racing with the freedom of vehicle customization and light exploration. Whether you're an autocross enthusiast aiming to perfect your craft or a casual driver looking for a new racing experience, Cone Crushers has something for everyone. Race through infinite procedural tracks, customize and fine-tune your vehicle, earn rewards and unlock new locations and garages that you can customize to your liking.

What is autocross?

Autocross is a timed motorsport competition where drivers navigate a course marked by cones, typically in a large parking lot, open space, or existing track. It emphasizes precision and handling over speed, with the goal of completing the course as quickly as possible without hitting cones. Vehicles are classed and times are calculated against an index that creates a level playing field for all vehicles, whether you are in a stock sedan or a full on supercar.  

At the heart of Cone Crushers is the desire to recreate the thrill of autocross racing while offering an open sandbox for players to experiment with their vehicles. We aim for a balance between realism and accessibility, ensuring that both novice and veteran racers can enjoy the gameplay. The focus on procedural track generation and customization ensures endless replay-ability, while the open-world environment allows players to enjoy moments of free driving between races. When you need a break from getting lost in the cones, easily switch up your vehicle's build to take a quick drift around the block, or maybe even rally through the woods. At the end of the day return to your garage and cash in your winnings to order some new stuff and build your dream garage.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 / AMD FX-6300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 380 with 2GB VRAM or equivale
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD RX Vega 56 with 8GB VRAM or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Cone Crushers: Autocross is a practical and engaging racing simulation designed for autocross enthusiasts. Featuring realistic physics, customizable vehicles and garages, and endless procedurally generated cone courses. Fine-tune your driving skills or even take a break for a bit of joyriding.
